title: Fasting of Pregnant and Breastfeeding Women in Ramadan - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: okay brother asthma from Denmark says that if a woman who's pregnant or breastfeeding what should she do in Ramadan if she fears for her safety or for her child's safety not finding enough milk or not being nourished sufficiently enough when she's fasting in this case allah has giving her the exemption she can break her fast she can skip fasting Ramadan until the obstacles are removed me maybe a year two years Allah knows then she is obliged to make up for the mistakes there's no feeding there is no expiration other than that his second
